resources.string:
Introduce Game: 
 Game is written by the author as WinMine written by APP.
Game rules:
 Start: in the mine box optionally start of a mine box, open the box if the number is the number of around mine.
Procedure: click an open box to set the mark or cancel the mark, double - click a box, if the box is opened, then automatically recognize the box.
Victory conditions: open all the boxes without Mine.
Fail condition: open the box with Mine.
